allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json for line in sys.stdin: try: obj = json.loads\(line.strip\(\)\) if obj.get\(''type''\) == ''human'': msg = obj.get\(''message'', {}\) if isinstance\(msg, dict\): content = msg.get\(''content'', ''''\) if isinstance\(content, str\) and content.strip\(\): print\(''USER:'', content[:500]\) elif isinstance\(content, list\): for c in content: if isinstance\(c, dict\) and c.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(''USER:'', c.get\(''text'', ''''\)[:500]\) except: pass ")
